thread.title: Carl

author: Carl
title: Carl
text:
My name is Carl A Lee Operations Manager for JC Logistics LTD. Kris took the initiative and contacted me to let us know we had capital available to us and the options for repayment, and use of it. He also told us about upcoming capital options we could possibly qualify for He walked us thru the entire process (start to finish).
We look foward to working with him in the future.
THANKS KRIS.
